segments.text: This is such a beautiful day ! Great for sailing !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sure is ! The water looks so nice ! Anchor the boat for a little while . I ’ m going to take a dip .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you doggy-paddling ? I taught you how to swim ! Do your breast stroke !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get too tired ! I ’ ll just backstroke , it ’ s easier !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try kicking your legs more . That ’ s good . Don ’ t go out too far !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Kathy ! Get back here ! I see a shark !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ahahah ! ! ! Help me ! Help ! Bring the boat closer ! The shark is coming straight towards me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s right under you ! Kathy ! ! !
segments.speaker: S1
